titles: A Ukrainian father's terrifying journey to a Russian prison and back
descriptions: Nikita Horban was abducted from his village and taken to Russia. He would come back without any toes.

titles: Ukraine war: Russian strike on Kyiv kills reporter Vira Hyrych
descriptions: Vira Hyrych, who worked for Radio Liberty, died after her residential building was hit on Thursday.

titles: British Virgin Islands: UK should take back rule - report
descriptions: The British overseas territory's government should be dissolved for two years, a report recommends.

titles: Foul-smelling foam clogs up Colombian town of Mosquera
descriptions: Detergents dumped in a local river are being linked to the filthy white phenomenon.

titles: Alexanda Kotey: IS 'Beatle' sentenced to life in US for murders in Syria
descriptions: Alexanda Kotey, 38, pleaded guilty last September to the beheading of IS hostages in Syria.

titles: South Africa's Jacob Zuma would do anything for the Guptas - Zondo report
descriptions: South Africa's ex-president Jacob Zuma would "do anything" for the Gupta business family, a report finds.

titles: Liberia war crimes: Sierra Leone rebel commander acquitted by court in Finland
descriptions: Gibril Massaquoi was a school teacher but then became the spokesman of a notorious rebel group.

titles: Heat wave in India leaves millions struggling to cope
descriptions: Experts say India is now recording more intense, frequent heatwaves that are also longer in duration.

titles: Israel airport chaos as family brings unexploded shell
descriptions: Chaos erupts as Americans bring a 'souvenir' unexploded shell into Israel's international airport.

titles: Shanghai lockdown: Residents protest after five weeks of strict zero-Covid measures
descriptions: Some residents have been under strict lockdown for five weeks, and struggled to access food supplies.

titles: James Corden leaving Late Late Show after eight years
descriptions: The British comedian and actor turned talk show host announced the decision on Thursday.

titles: Depp v Heard: What you might have missed this week
descriptions: The court hears evidence of personality disorders, drug abuse and a relationship with Elon Musk.

titles: Why British royals face simmering resentment in Caribbean
descriptions: More awareness of the region's history and calls for slavery reparations have changed sentiment.

titles: Ukraine launches hunt for Russian soldiers accused of Bucha war crimes
descriptions: The 10 Russian soldiers are wanted for alleged war crimes - but at home, they have been hailed as heroes.

titles: How big are Donald Trump's legal problems?
descriptions: As he plots his political future, two criminal probes and multiple lawsuits could spell trouble.

titles: Barkha Dutt: 'My father did not have to die'
descriptions: A year after losing her father to Covid, Indian journalist Barkha Dutt writes on coping with loss and regret.

titles: The children surviving Ukraine's war without their parents
descriptions: Eleven-year-old Angelina is one of many children who were forced to flee hundreds of miles from their homes on Ukraine's front line.

titles: Sirens ring out in Israel to honour Holocaust victims
descriptions: Streets came to a standstill as people paused to pay tribute to the millions killed in the Holocaust.

titles: War in Ukraine absurd and evil, says UN chief
descriptions: Antonio Guterres addresses reporters outside a wreckage of apartment blocks north west of Kyiv.

titles: Ukrainians flock to get patriotic tattoos
descriptions: People headed to the front line, and their supporters, are having the country's war with Russia memorialise.

titles: Critically endangered monkey born in Colombian zoo
descriptions: A cotton-top tamarin monkey has made its first public appearance at Cali Zoo in Colombia.
